feed.title: Press Releases
feed.subtitle: The official site of Dillard University. Located in beautiful New Orleans.

entry.title: Press Releases
entry.summary:
July 14, 2014 HBCU Digest selects Dillard’s Nursing Program as “Best” for the second year Cynthia Butler-McIntyre is “Best Female Alumnus” and President Kimbrough selected “Male HBCU President of the Year”
